original_title: Rickie Lee Jones - Live in Stockholm
overview: Rickie Lee Jones performs at Berns Salonger in Stockholm, Sweden, on March 7, 2011. 2010 marked the 30th anniversary of the dawn of Rickie Lee Jones storied recording career, which exploded in 1979 with her self-titled debut album and its top 10 hit, 'Chuck E.'s In Love.' Jones had an immediate impact on pop culture, enjoying the massive buzz, an instantaneous Rolling Stone cover, and winning the Grammy for Best New Artist. Three decades later and she s still one of the most vital, distinctive and instantly recognizable voices in music.
title: Rickie Lee Jones - Live in Stockholm
